FuncDef: This command enables BGP routes to be matched based on the IP addresses encoded in the CLUSTER_LIST attribute.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the 32-bit cluster ID in dotted decimal notation. Values-a.b.c.d.
Specifies a bit mask to apply to the ip-address parameter. Values-0 to 32 (0 is only allowed if the ip-address is 0.0.0.0).
Specifies that only BGP routes without a CLUSTER_LIST attribute should be matched.
